title: Are there any snowdown chests with the chance of giving kittycat katarina?

replies.body: Winter chests uphold normal hextech chest properties so you have a chance of finding legacy skin shards like Kitty Cat Katarina.  Specific Snowdown chests can offer specific skins, and it looks like the[ Nightmare Before Snowdown ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/236357867-Snowdown-Chests)chest had a chance for Kitty Cat Katarina.  Bookmark the guide and stay updated on any specific chests that might appear during Snowdown.   Good luck!
